Title: Primary Urethral Tuberculosis With Urethrocutaneous Fistula in Association With Balanitis Xerotica Obliterans
Abstract: © 2020We present an unusual case of isolated urethral tuberculosis. The patient had a history of urethral strictures and persistent discharge from two peno-scrotal fistulas which was confirmed on urethrogram. He was treated with antitubercular treatment and a two stage urethroplasty.
